resources.string: Only the details and image fields are optional.
The maximum durations are: weekly 12 months, other 120 months.
Are you sure you want to reset the password and delete all events?

This application can be used to track events. Events can be created by selecting a date from the calendar. There are two types of events: simple events with no recurrence and events with recurrence.\n\nThe recurrence field specifies when an event will repeat and the recurrence duration specifies when the recurrence stops.

Images can be added to events. Note that events with recurrence will share the same image. 

Another optional feature is the password protection feature, once a password is set events may be locked and unlocked and if events are locked then you will not be able to access any feature involving events.

 For more info read the user manual at:
